quotes.quote: Great style means having a point of view, but evolving your look is even more important. Rushing to embrace every trend will leave you fashionable, but not stylish.
Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.
It doesn't matter what kind of clothes you put on: if you're a stylish individual, you're going to preserve that.
You don't need to follow trends to be stylish.
Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
A fashionable woman is always in love - with herself.
The truly fashionable are beyond fashion.
The fashionable woman wears clothes. The clothes don't wear her.
You can make jeans and a t-shirt super stylish. It's what you make of it, you know?
Fashion should be stylish and fun.
Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only.
Fashion is in the sky, in the street.
Fashion is everything that can pass fashionable
It is ever so much easier to be good if your clothes are fashionable.
